name: Isola
description:
A simple exploration game. Mine samples while hiding from dangerous solar flares. Will you be able to discover the origin of the solar anomalies?

  • Controls: WASD or arrow keys to move and spacebar to interact

Game and all art assets made by Pozitronic with help from Trashwizard.

Music & SFX assets:

https://opengameart.org/content/floating-through-the-void
https://opengameart.org/content/50-cc0-retro-synth-sfx
https://opengameart.org/content/background-rumble-noise
https://opengameart.org/content/out-in-space
